Country Roads of Italy, A Women-only Tour | Insight Vacations | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Country Roads of Italy, A Women-Only Tour 16 days | Rome to Venice Embark on an unforgettable 16-day women-only journey across the enchanting landscapes of Italy, from the breathtaking shores of the Amalfi Coast to the serene canals of Venice. Join a small group tour and immerse yourself in the rich cultural tapestry of this vibrant country, where each stop promises unique experiences and unforgettable moments. Explore a winery on the Amalfi Coast, renowned for exceptional wine and olive oil production. Journey to Castel Gandolfo and marvel at its papal gardens as you ride an electric train through the mosaic flower beds. Sail to the picturesque island of Capri, where you can ascend nearly 2,000 feet for unparalleled views of the Tyrrhenian Sea. In Perugia, delve into the art of loom-weaving with a women-owned and operated weaving association, gaining insight into centuries-old techniques. Then, indulge in a cocktail-making class in Florence, where you'll learn the secrets of crafting the perfect Italian libation. Conclude your adventure in Venice, gliding through its iconic canals to the charming island of Burano, known for its vibrant colours and artisanal craftsmanship. Here, you'll toast to the journey's success with artist and environmentalist Allison Zurfluh, savouring the memories of a truly fantastic trip across Italy. Day 1 Welcome to the Eternal City of Rome Day 2 Vatican and Rome with a Local Day 3 Castel Gandolfo Day 4 Capri, the Isle of Dreams and picturesque Amalfi Coast Day 5 Pompeii and Todi Day 6 Todi Day 7 Assisi and on to Perugia Day 8 Perugia, the Jewel of Umbria Day 9 Siena and San Gimignano Day 10 Florence Day 11 On to Luccca Day 12 Exploring the Cinque Tere Day 13 On to Parma Day 14 Modena and on to Venice Day 15 The Magic of La Serenissima Day 16 Arrivederci Venice Highlights Explore ancient Rome with a passionate local, visiting Circus Maximus, the Ancient Forum, and the iconic Colosseum. Enjoy breathtaking views of Mount Vesuvius across the Bay of Naples from cliffside perches. Cruise by jetfoil to the famous Isle of Capri to explore its artistic treasures, including the Villa Barberini Gardens and its mosaic flower beds and fountains. Experience the Italian social ritual of "la passeggiata" in charming Siena, where you'll visit the medieval black and white striped cathedral. Join a local expert to admire the multi-colored marble cathedral, bell tower, and baptistery in Florence, along with the iconic Ghiberti's Gates of Paradise. Visit Cinque Terre, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, with its picturesque fishing villages nestled along the rugged Italian Riviera coastline. Cruise to St. Mark's Square in Venice, where you'll see the Doge's Palace, Bridge of Sighs, and St. Mark's Basilica. Walk through the cobbled streets of Pompeii with a local expert, exploring the ancient ruins frozen in time since the 1st century. Discover the Basilica of Saint Francis in Assisi, renowned as one of the greatest achievements of medieval Europe.
